A maximum 30 volunteer randomly divide four group . All volunteer receive standard weekly chloroquine chemoprophylaxis period 14 week ( 98 day ) . During period , group 1 3 receive six ID injection PfSPZ Challenge , contain total 75,000 PfSPZ Pf NF54 strain , day 8 , 36 64 ( immunization 1 , 2 3 ) . Thirty-three day last dose chloroquine , volunteer group 1 2 control human malaria infection ( CHMI ) bite five mosquito infect PfSPZ Pf NF54 strain . If ≥75 % volunteer group 1 protect homologous Pf CHMI , volunteer group 3 4 CHMI bite five mosquito infect heterologous Pf NF135.C10 strain 75 day last dose chloroquine . If < 75 % volunteer group 1 protect homologous Pf CHMI , volunteer group 3 4 receive additional immunization ( immunization 4 ) , consist six ID injection day 75,000 PfSPZ Challenge NS respectively , day 162 . In fourth immunization period chloroquine administer another 6 week start day 154 . Finally , 33 day last dose chloroquine , volunteer group 3 4 homologous Pf CHMI bite five PfSPZ-infected mosquito .
